job_tasks.justification: Executing test plans is a core part of the software development lifecycle, ensuring the quality of the software before deployment.
Identifying and reporting bugs is a crucial step in the software development process for debugging and fixing issues.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with our development team to resolve issues
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with the development team to resolve issues is integral to the software development process for product improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: create and implement comprehensive test plans
job_tasks.justification: Creating and implementing test plans is a fundamental software development activity to ensure product quality.
Performing manual and automated tests is a standard practice in software development to verify functionality.
Reporting test findings is part of the software development process to communicate quality status and issues.
Regression testing is a software development task to ensure new changes haven't adversely affected existing functionality.
Documenting and reporting test results is essential for tracking software quality and progress.
Providing feedback for continuous improvement is a common practice in software development to enhance product quality.
Participating in code reviews is a software development practice to ensure code quality and share knowledge.

job_tasks.phrase: provide input on quality assurance standards and processes
job_tasks.justification: Providing input on QA standards is part of the software development process for establishing best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies in software testing
job_tasks.justification: While not direct data engineering, staying updated with technologies can involve understanding tools that interact with data pipelines or quality metrics, though the primary focus is on testing.

classification.rationale: This job description focuses entirely on traditional Quality Assurance (QA) and software testing, lacking any mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies. The core responsibilities and tasks are centered around ensuring software quality through test plans, bug identification, and regression testing, which are standard software development practices and not specific to AI engineering roles.
